模块 org.overrun.swgl.core
程序包 org.overrun.swgl.core.gl

类 GLProgram

java.lang.Object
org.overrun.swgl.core.gl.GLProgram
所有已实现的接口:
AutoCloseable
public class GLProgram extends Object implements AutoCloseable
The OpenGL program wrapper.
从以下版本开始:
0.1.0
作者:
squid233

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GLProgram

      public GLProgram(VertexLayout layout)
      Construct the program with the specified vertex layout.
      参数:
      layout - The vertex layout.
      另请参阅:
      • create()

    • GLProgram

      public GLProgram()
      Construct the program without vertex layout. You have to set the layout manually.
      另请参阅:
      • create()

  • 方法详细资料

      public void layoutBeginDraw()
      Call VertexLayout.beginDraw()

    • layoutEndDraw

      public void layoutEndDraw()
      Call VertexLayout.endDraw()

      Get the vertex layout.
      返回:

      public void setLayout(VertexLayout layout)
      Set the vertex layout.
      参数:

    • create

      public boolean create()
      Create the program.
      返回:
      Is creating success

    • link

      public boolean link()
      Link this program.
      返回:
      Is linking success

    • getInfoLog

      public String getInfoLog()
      Get the info log from this program.
      返回:
      The info log.

    • bindAttribLoc

      public void bindAttribLoc(int index, CharSequence name)
      Associates a generic vertex attribute index with a named attribute variable.
      参数:
      index - the index of the generic vertex attribute to be bound
      name - a null terminated string containing the name of the vertex shader attribute variable to which index is to be bound
      从以下版本开始:
      0.2.0

    • getAttribLoc

      public int getAttribLoc(CharSequence name)
      Get the attribute location.
      参数:
      name - The attribute name.
      返回:
      The location.

    • enableAttrib

      public void enableAttrib(String name)
      Enable an attribute.
      参数:
      name - The attribute name.

    • disableAttrib

      public void disableAttrib(String name)
      Disable an attribute.
      参数:
      name - The attribute name.

    • bind

      public void bind()
      Use this program.

    • unbind

      public void unbind()
      Drop this program.

    • attribPtr

      public void attribPtr(String name, VertexFormat format)
      Set the vertex attribute pointer.
      参数:
      name - The attribute name.
      format - The vertex format of the attribute.

    • getUniformLoc

      public int getUniformLoc(CharSequence name)
      Get the uniform location.
      参数:

    • createUniform

      public GLUniform createUniform(CharSequence name, GLUniformType type)
      Create a uniform.
      参数:
      name - The uniform name.
      type - The uniform type.

    • getUniform

      public GLUniform getUniform(CharSequence name)
      Get the uniform.
      参数:
      name - The uniform name.
      返回:
      The uniform. Null if not created.

    • getUniformSafe

      public GLUniform getUniformSafe(CharSequence name, GLUniformType type)
      Get the uniform. Will auto create a uniform when it's absent.
      参数:
      name - The uniform name.
      type - The uniform type.
      返回:
      The uniform.

    • updateUniforms

      public void updateUniforms()
      Update all dirty uniforms.

      返回:
      The GL id.
